channel.title: Applications on Automated API and Unit testing Docs for OpenFOAM libs
channel.description: Recent content in Applications on Automated API and Unit testing Docs for OpenFOAM libs

item.title: ADRs
item.description:
We abuse ADRs to record any activity on the repo, may it be related to architecture, design, implementation or any other aspect that affects the project’s future. ADRs are categorized by their status as follows:

  • Proposed ADR: written out, and was investigated
  • Under-review ADR: reviewing viability of acceptance
  • Enforced ADR: accepted as viable, and set in effect
  • Rejected ADR: dropped out
  • Deprecated ADR: was in effect, but now preparing to retire
  • Superseded ADR: was in effect, but was replaced by another decision
